title: Derivatives at Multiple Points
description: Implement `derivative_table(f, points, h=1e-5)` that returns a list of `(x, df/dx)` tuples — the derivative of `f` evaluated at each `x` in `points`.
solutionCode:
def derivative_table(f, points, h=1e-5):
    return [(x, (f(x + h) - f(x - h)) / (2 * h)) for x in points]
hints: Apply the centered difference formula for each point
